p: D. peninervium showed comparable activity against L. aethiopica (IC 50 =13.38±1.20 µg/mL) as that of O. integrifolia, while it exhibited lower activity against L. donovani (IC 50 =63.62±1.84 µg/mL) ( Table 1). In another study, the essential oil from the same plant exhibited better activity against L. aethiopica (IC 50=12.62 μg/mL) and L. donovani (IC 50=19.93 μg/mL). 25
